document_data.name: ''Charm of Protection from Spirits''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Charms of protection from spirits''''' were bijou sheets of paper that held protective magics.
document_data.Description: ''Charms of protection from spirits'' were [[ink]]ed with treats to spirits on red or yellow pieces of paper.

Powers.Creation: The more powerful a ''charms of protection from spirits'' was, the more proficient the crafter of wondrous items had to be. They were created using the  ''[[protection from spirits]]'' and ''[[heighten spell]]'' magics.
